Class CDataFileDoubleArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.casper.ext.file.def.CDataFileDoubleArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.casper.io.file.def.CDataFile

    public class CDataFileDoubleArray
extends Object
implements net.casper.io.file.def.CDataFile
    Provides a double array from the columns of a CDataFile.
    Version:
    $Revision: 193 $
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion
